short_summary: This bid solicitation is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H and covers a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Edmonton, Calgary, Montreal, Kitchener and Fredericton.
description: Amendment 001 is raised to change Annex A, Annex B, and the request for bid solicitation closing date.
full_summary:
# Office Seating Tender Notice
================================================

### Contract Details

* **Title:** Office Seating for Edmonton, Calgary, Montreal, Kitchener, and Fredericton
* **Reference Number:**  cb-392-849323
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Date of Invitation:** 2024-01-29
* **Closing Date:** 2024-01-29T15:00:00

### Tender Status

The tender is currently **Cancelled**.

### Product Description

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada invites eligible Supply Arrangement (SA) holders to submit a bid for the provision of office seating. The products to be procured cover the following product sub-categories:

*	**Rotary Chairs and Stools** (Product Sub-Category 1)
*	**Rotary Guest Chair and Side Chairs** (Product Sub-Category 2)

### Location of Delivery Sites

The office seating will be delivered and installed at the following locations:

*	Edmonton (Alberta)
*	Calgary (Alberta)
*	Montreal (Quebec)
*	Kitchener (Ontario)
*	Fredericton (New-Brunswick)

### Required Delivery Date

The office seating must be delivered by **March 28, 2024**.

### Notice Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H.

### Selection Criteria

The bid will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

*	**Name:** Steven French
*	**Email:** [IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca](mailto:IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca)
*	**Phone:** 613-293-2493
*	**Fax:** Not available

### Additional Documentation

Please refer to the following document URLs for additional information:

*	https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29383/questions-and-answers-round-1---1er-tour-questions-et-reponses.pdf
*	https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29383/questions-and-answers-round-2---2eme-tour-questions-et-reponses.pdf
*	https://canadabuys.can
